thread.title: School Leavers Welcome

title: School Leavers Welcome
text:
Region : Gauteng / Johannesburg / Edenvale Company : Lavender Health 
COMPANY REQUIRES MOTIVATED INDIVIDUALS TO JOIN THEIR DYNAMIC TEAM. R9500 Basic Salary. Bonuses + above average commission. Full company training provided. No Experience Needed. REQUIREMENTS: Own vehicle and drivers license is a must! Good people skills and presentable! Have to stay in Gauteng or close to the East Rand! For a interview call 011 869 6345 which will give you the fastest result or sms name and contact number to 0725986489 and we will call you back.
